channel.title: Attacking NPC
channel.description: How to make so more than 1 player could attack 1 npc?

item.title: Attacking NPC
item.dc:creator: @scriptz scriptz
item.description:
@scriptz wrote:

[quote=“slay603, post:4, topic:336698”]this is on a 317.

Search for

public boolean multiCombat()

This is for delta

Then youll see a statement something like this.

(absX >= 2960 && absX <= 2994 && absY >= 3597 && absY <=3635) ||

Find the position south east position of your multi combat

Then, find the northwest position of your multi combat

And copy this code

(absX >= 2960 && absX <= 2994 && absY >= 3597 && absY <=3635) ||

replace the lower x coordinate after this. absx >=
the lower y coordinate after this. absy >=
Then, the higher x coordinate after this. absx <=
and the higher y coordinate after this. absy <=

to get these coordinates you type in ::mypos (on normal servers)

I hope this wasn’t to confusing GL on your future endeavor.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Attacking NPC
item.dc:creator: @slay603 slay603
item.description:
@slay603 wrote:

this is on a 317.

Search for

public boolean multiCombat()

Then youll see a statement something like this.

(absX >= 2960 && absX <= 2994 && absY >= 3597 && absY <=3635) ||

Find the position south east position of your multi combat

Then, find the northwest position of your multi combat

And copy this code

(absX >= 2960 && absX <= 2994 && absY >= 3597 && absY <=3635) ||

replace the lower x coordinate after this. absx >=
the lower y coordinate after this. absy >=
Then, the higher x coordinate after this. absx <=
and the higher y coordinate after this. absy <=

to get these coordinates you type in ::mypos (on normal servers)

I hope this wasn’t to confusing GL on your future endeavor.
